channel.title: Vitalize-PK [REBORN]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r03vE.png[/img]
[b]Promo:[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s18ZI61eQds
[b]Links:[/b] [url=http://vitalize-pk.cz.cc/forums]Forums[/url] | [url=http://vitalize-pk.cz.cc/forums/misc.php?page=webclient]Webclient[/url] | [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/36288851/client.jar]Download Client[/url]
[b]Info:[/b] VitalizePK is an old school based server, Any later RS content such as dragon defender is a challenge to obtain. We aim to keep a balance as most people will be able to easily obtain basic PK items, barrows, non-spawnables (torso, defender etc.) with ease and get pking. But the option is there for anyone who puts the effort in to gain an advantage with more powerful items such as PvP armour etc.[/center]
[b]Staff Team:[/b]
[ul][li]Dan. (Main Developer)[/li] [li]Harry. (Co-Owner)[/li][/ul]
[b]Server Content:[/b]
[ul][li]Flawless switching.[/li] [li]Great combat.[/li] [li]Hyperion Core.[/li] [li]Instant login and PK.[/li] [li]Various PK teleports.[/li][/ul]
[b]Client Content:[/b]
[ul][li]377 cache loading some 600+ items.[/li] [li]Toggle options e.g x10 hits.[/li] [li]Low data usage.[/li] [li]Small cache.[/li] [li]Clean and tidy.[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Media:[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sBZXn.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wWaSr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/L7azl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/63lNF.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DaUGC.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cR5pN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GLAm4.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Vitalize-PK [REBORN]
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:8, topic:466209”][quote author=Xx Weed Xx link=topic=578391.msg4149450#msg4149450 date=1352359884]

Dan this shits so easy to exploit. You enjoy looking at my bank?

I’m currently working on fixing exploits, I honestly don’t give two shits about you, you’re wasting your time. Keep thinking you’re some bad ass because you can exploit a PI :L. Remember when you use to come and cry to me because nobody on the server liked you, “Dan I might quit, idk” l000000000l :rolleyes:.
[/quote]

then you begged me stay and i fucked up your eco more… ahh the days dan[/quote]

Where have you got the idea from that I begged you to stay? You PM’d me everyday asking me whether or not you should stay and I of course being the owner said yes, as that’s more players. Also I never said you didn’t? It’s a PI, who couldn’t? I’m working on fixing exploits as we speak, the server is a spawn + master & is in BETA at the moment so a reset won’t hurt.

@HydrationPK, Going into your C: drive and delete “Vitalize-PK” then re-download it.

Read full topic

Info:
VitalizePK is an old school based server, Any later RS content such as dragon defender is a challenge to obtain. We aim to keep a balance as most people will be able to easily obtain basic PK items, barrows, non-spawnables (torso, defender etc.) with ease and get pking.
